quest_desc.qdesc: 독주머니(400091) 독주머니 10개 수집. 수집되는 아이템 아니고, 스테이지를 제대로 진행하면 마지막 보스전 후 npc에게 습득하게 되어 있음. 이하 진행 개요. 아르젠타에게 퀘스트 수락. 1번 필드에서 데이비드와 대화. 3번 필드에서 데이비드와 대화. 보스 클리어 후 데이비드와 대화. 데이비드에게 독 주머니 10개 습득. 아르젠타에게 보고.

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Adventurer David$
Looks like you need my signature! No worries, the first signature will be free of charge. Heh.
(You must receive the quest from Argenta at Gray Ruins to proceed.)

$Argenta$
Even though handling you jobs can be rather annoying.
Still… I am going to use you.

$Argenta$
Are you heading to Dark Tower Magic Institute?
Since you are making a trip here, why not help me out as well.

$Argenta$
This job can be easily accomplish alone.
Not like I am gonna ask you to capture the Dragon. Go alone.

(You cannot proceed the quest while in a party)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> ... A little? How little is considered little? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
This job is so simple that any injured Hound finish it. All you need to do is to bring me some Poison Sac.

$Argenta$
What? A little bit is a little bit. Does the exact number matters? Anyway, all you need to do is to kill a few of monsters at Dark Tower Magic Institute. As simple as it sound?
<html>$Argenta's Poison Sac$</html>

$Argenta$
I won't be waiting long for you? We shall see...

$Argenta$
Are you heading to Dark Tower Magic Institute?
Since you are making a trip here, why not help me out as well.

$Argenta$
This job can be easily accomplish alone.
Not like I am gonna ask you to capture the Dragon. Go alone.

(You cannot proceed the quest while in a party)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> ... A little? How little is considered little? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
This job is so simple that any injured Hound finish it. All you need to do is to bring me some Poison Sac.

$Argenta$
What? A little bit is a little bit. Does the exact number matters? Anyway, all you need to do is to kill a few of monsters at Dark Tower Magic Institute. As simple as it sound?
<html>$Argenta' Poison Sac$</html>

$Adventurer David$
Heh. You again! Quit following me around? Heh. Heh. Heh.
(Please go talk to Argenta in Gray Ruins.)

$Argenta$
I won't be around to wait for you for a long time.
Deal with it yourself.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> (This is why the person deserve to be ignored.) </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Seems like Great Adventurer David's has a new follower. Ha.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm here to find a Poison Sac.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
So what excuse do you have in mind this time round to follow me? Heh.
I'm at all ears.

$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
What? (Adventurer David laughed.)
Heh. This is the worst reason I ever come across.
Newbie! The Poison Sac that you are looking for doesn't exist around here! Heh. Heh. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Can't you go alone? Heh. Heh. Heh.
(Adventurer David's arrogance is acting up again)

$Adventurer David$
So you travel so far here just for a Poison Sac... Like I predicted, Newbie! Heh. Heh. Heh.
(Adventurer David's arrogance is acting up again)

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Are you curious why can't you get the Poison Sac, are you? You poor thing. I will specially tell you!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> I was told to do this</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
You can retrieve the Poison Sac at Death Basin, not here! Heh. As expected, a Newbie having such limited information, I the Great Adventurer David will never make such a grave mistake. Heh. Heh. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> But I'll not give any money. </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Are you trying to push the blame? Having such attitude, you will never become a Great Adventurer. Heh. Is okay Newbie! I might have some Poison Sac on hand. Heh. Heh. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Did you think I, Great Adventurer, will give you a Poison Sac for a small token? You are not even any where near there yet. Heh. Heh. Heh. Of course, I will give it to you freely, if you fufil my some requirements.

$Adventurer David$
I, Adventurer David almost slay the Spider Queen in there. Sadly, my hand slipped during the battle, so I had no choice but to stop and rest for a moment! Agh! I am sure the Spider Queen will be dead by now if such accident didn't happen. I could have delivered my final blow! Guess what? I bet the Spider Queen is smirking at one corner right now. Heh. Heh. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's just pure coincidence, nothing to do with clairvoyance.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Those are for real! Have you seen me lying? Heh. Heh. Heh. For I am the Greatest and Powerful and Honest Adventurer. As you know already, I have clairvoyance. Heh. That is why I preserve some Poison Sac for you, Newbie. Beg me, and I shall give you those Poison Sac.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Feeling so horrified, tears almost fall. </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
But! If you slay Spider Queen, I will fulfil your request! Remember, just one final blow will be sufficient to slay the Spider Queen. Just one hit!! Perfect? Doesn't it feels like a dream, being able to get the Poison Sac with hitting the Spider Queen just once?

$Adventurer David$
Don't be too thrilled~ Heh. Now, you go defeat Spider Queen. Remember, all it takes is just one more blow to kill the Spider Queen! Heh. Heh. Heh.
(Adventurer David's arrogance is acting up again)

$Adventurer David$
.. Upon encountering the Spider Queen I was so shocked that I dropped my weapon. Sheesh... No one saw that scene right?.
(Adventurer David was trembling as he spoke.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It took more than just one hit.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Ha. Ha. Ha. Rookie {user_nick}!!
I enjoyed very much of you Rookie form, when you were struggling against Spider Queen who just needs one more hit to defeat!! Ha.

$Adventurer David$
What's because you are such a weakling. Frankly speaking, I could kill the Spider Queen with just a half of hit, not one hit! Ha.

$Adventurer David$
No lies is needed! For I am the Great Adventurer. Were you stunned by my intellectual speech?
Heh. Anyway, here is the Poison Sac which I promised.

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. So long Newbie!
(Adventurer David stares into the sky aimlessly.)

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. So long Newbie!
(Adventurer David stares into the sky aimlessly.)

$Argenta$
What took you so long? Weakling {user_nick}.
So, have you bought the Poison Sac?

$Argenta$
As expected, you are such a fool, a unfailing fool! Now you only brought 10 Poison Sac.
(Argenta ate those Poison Sac in a single breath.)

$Argenta$
Why are you so surprized? It is common sense that drinking a mild poison actually boost body. You mean you didn't know about it?
Even humans are putting the mild poison in their foods.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I remember I overhead that, Poison Sac can be found in Death Basin.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
I'm not dying. Do I look dead now?
Why are you still staring at me? Seems like you do have a problem with me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But you told me that Poison Sac are in Dark Tower Magic Institute.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Oh, really?
So what?

$Argenta$
Poison Sac were in Dark Tower Magic Institute at least a few days ago. I believe those monster might have moved since they have legs. Why are you always arguing with me about trivial matters? You are so narrow-minded.

$Argenta$
Seems like you are still a young kid? Run along now.
But chances that I might have more job for you later on, get back here if I call okay?
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Argenta$
Why? Can't I use you freely as and when I like it? Be glad that you are my most comfortable slave in whole world. Be grateful, you will have a better future..

journal.title: Argenta's Errand
journal.contents:
Argenta assigned an errand to you. Collect Poison Sac at Dark Tower Magic. Even though you have no idea how to collect, just head down to Dark Tower Magic.
(You cannot proceed the quest while in a party)

Cristal Stream → Blizzard Plain(Road of No Return) → Dark Tower Magic
journal.destination: (Solo) Explore the Dark Tower Magic Institute.

journal.title: Strange Adventurer David
journal.contents:
You met a strange person named, Adventurer David. He seems like he knows how to collect the Poison Sac, but he is not willing to share. You might need to venture into the deeper area to uncover the secret. So let's move forward.

Blizzard Plain(Road of No Return) → Dark Tower Magic.
journal.destination: Explore the Dark Tower Magic Institute.
journal.todo_msg: Please venture into the deeper area to find Poison Sac.

journal.title: Adventurer David's Suggestion
journal.contents:
Adventurer David offered a suggestion. If you defeat the Spider Queen, Adventurer David will reward you with Poison Sac. Adventurer David said that he has almost kill Spider Queen. Although it sound suspicious, we shall just go ahead with that plan.

Blizzard Plain(Road of No Return) → Dark Tower Magic

journal.title: Adventurer David Cracker
journal.contents:
You have slayed Spider Queen. As you have promised with Adventurer David, you have to go get Poison Sac from Adventurer David.

Dark Tower Magic → Adventurer David
journal.todo_msg: You have killed Spider Queen. Please go talk to Adventurer David.

journal.title: Collect Poison Sac
journal.contents:
You have received Poison Sac. Let's go back to Gray Ruins and give Poison Sac to Argenta.

Gray Ruins → Argenta
journal.todo_msg: You have been collected Poison Sac. Please report to Argenta in Gray Ruins.
